HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content:
This version adds a lot of Cattle as well as a Badger, a Gerbil and a Turkey. Most of the cattle can only be bought by traders.
The mod will continue to grow and the next up is different types of sheep. For a list of the different cattle and their stats please see the mod-page for more information.

This version brings 8 new types of sheep: Assaf, Awassi, Bighorn, Border Leicester, Jacobs, Lincoln, Mouflon and Suffolk. The graphics for the Merino-sheep has also been updated to fit in with the style more. More sheep are yet to come!
